meanings.sent1: The puppy's aw face made me feel sad.
meanings.sent2: She gave an aw look when she saw the broken vase.
meanings.sent3: Aw, don't worry, we can fix it together.
meanings.sent4: Her aw expression melted my heart.
meanings.sent5: The aw expression on his face was truly touching.

meanings.definition: Used to express admiration or approval.
meanings.sent2: Aw, you did such a great job on the project.
meanings.sent3: Aw, you never fail to impress me with your skills.
meanings.sent4: Her performance was so good, I couldn't help but say aw.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was so beautiful, all I could say was aw.

meanings.definition: A sound made to express pity or compassion.
meanings.sent1: I heard an aw from the crowd as the injured player was carried off.
meanings.sent2: The little girl's aw was full of genuine concern for the stray kitten.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's aw was almost like it understood the sadness in the room.
meanings.sent4: The aw from the audience showed their sympathy for the singer's emotional performance.
meanings.sent5: The aw of the onlookers echoed through the quiet street.
